name: Supremacy MMA Unrestricted
description:
Supremacy MMA takes the non-stop brutal action of unsanctioned amateur and unlicensed MMA fighting to new levels with the power of the PlayStation®Vita System. Featuring refined, amped-up gameplay and controls, as well as new fighters and new locations, Supremacy MMA on PS Vita delivers fast and furious arcade style gameplay.

2011 Supremacy MMA is a trademark of MMA Holding Group, LLC used under license by 505 Games S.r.l. And it’s subsidiaries. All rights reserved. Published by 505 Games. 505 Games and the 505 Games logo are registered trademarks of 505 Games s.r.l. All rights reserved.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
